title: 1stMate.Evidence
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Attlebrox>>
<<NameTagMove|leftEdge>>
<<Portrait|1stMate_happy>>
Hello, Captain.
<</Textbox>>


    <<if $Clue1Found is true and ($Clue1Owner1 is "FirstMate" or $Clue1Owner2 is "FirstMate")>>
        [[What do you know about $Clue1?|1stMate.Question]]
<<endif>>
<<if $Clue2Found is true and ($Clue2Owner1 is "FirstMate" or $Clue2Owner2 is "FirstMate")>>
    [[What do you know about $Clue2?|1stMate.Question2]]
<<endifFirstMate
<<if $Clue3Found is true and ($Clue3Owner1 is "FirstMate" or $Clue3Owner2 is "FirstMate")>>
    [[What do you know about $Clue3?|1stMate.Question3]]
<<endif>>
<<if $Clue4Found is true and ($Clue4Owner1 is "FirstMate" or $Clue4Owner2 is "FirstMate")>>
    [[What do you know about this $Clue4?|1stMate.Question4]]
<<endif>>


    //<<if $Clue1Found is true and ($Clue1Owner1 != "1stMate" or $Clue1Owner2 != "1stMate")>> 
//[[1stMate.Redirect]]
//<<endif>>
    //<<if $Clue2Found is true and ($Clue2Owner1 != "1stMate" or $Clue2Owner2 != "1stMate")>> 
//[[1stMate.Redirect2]]
//<<endif>>
 //   <<if $Clue3Found is true and ($Clue3Owner1 != "1stMate" or $Clue3Owner2 != "1stMate")>> 
//[[1stMate.Redirect3]]
//<<endif>>
  //  <<if $Clue4Found is true and ($Clue4Owner1 != "1stMate" or $Clue4Owner2 != "1stMate")>> 
//[[1stMate.Redirect4]]
//<<endif>>

//[[That's all.|1stMate.Bye]]

title: 1stMate.Bye
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
<<NameTagMove|rightEdge>>
That's all.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Attlebrox>>
<<NameTagMove|leftEdge>>
<<Portrait|1stMate_neutral>>
Farewell, Captain.
<</Textbox>>

//End of conversation

title: 1stMate.Question
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
<<NameTagMove|rightEdge>>
Do you know anything about $Clue1?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Attlebrox>>
<<NameTagMove|leftEdge>>
<<Portrait|1stMate_Neutral>>
I do believe that $Clue1 is mine, sir. If I may ask, why is it in your possession?
<</Textbox>>

[[I found it in $Clue1Location.|1stMate.Clue]]

[[That's none of your business.|1stMate.Upset]]

[[That's all.|1stMate.Bye]]

title: 1stMate.Clue
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
<<NameTagMove|rightEdge>>
I found it in $Clue1Location, I figured it could help the investigation.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Attlebrox>>
<<NameTagMove|leftEdge>>
<<Portrait|1stMate_Neutral>>
Is that so? I ususally keep that around just in case I'd need it. As for why it was where you found it, I do not know.
<</Textbox>>

[[What does $Clue1 do?|1stMate.Key]]

[[You're telling me half of it.|1stMate.Upset2]]

title: 1stMate.Upset
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
<<NameTagMove|rightEdge>>
That's none of your business.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Attlebrox>>
<<NameTagMove|leftEdge>>
<<Portrait|1stMate_mad>>
I'm disappointed in what's become of you, Captain. You've got some growing up to do.
<</Textbox>>

<< if visited ("1stMate.Loyalty")>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
<<NameTagMove|rightEdge>>
. . .
<</Textbox>>

<<else>>

[[1stMate.Loyalty]]

<<endif>>


//End of conversation

title: 1stMate.Key
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
<<NameTagMove|rightEdge>>
What exactly does this $Clue1 do?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Attlebrox>>
<<NameTagMove|leftEdge>>
<<Portrait|1stMate_neutral>>
Many things. It's simple, but versatile.
<</Textbox>>

<<set $FirstMatetestimony1 to "Many things. It's simple, but versatile.">>
<<AddEntry TestimonyCanvas $FirstMatetestimony1 1stMate_happy>>

//Clue Key Dialogue

[[1stMate.Bye]]

How's it goin'?

title: 1stMate.Truth
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Attlebrox>>
<<NameTagMove|leftEdge>>
<<Portrait|1stMate_Neutral>>
<<if "First Mate" == $TruthTeller1 or "FirstMate" == $TruthTeller1>>
$TruthTeller2 passed by the room while I was there.
<<elseif "First Mate" == $TruthTeller2 or "FirstMate" == $TruthTeller2>>
$TruthTeller1 passed by the room while I was there.
<<endif>>
<</Textbox>>

    <<if $TruthTeller1 == "Pilot">>
<<ChangeMention _ProceduralManager Pilot true>>
    <<endif>>

    <<if $TruthTeller2 == "Pilot">>
<<ChangeMention _ProceduralManager Pilot true>>
    <<endif>>

    <<if $Truthteller1 == "Medic">>
<<ChangeMention _ProceduralManager Medic true>>
    <<endif>>

    <<if $TruthTeller2 == "Medic">>
<<ChangeMention _ProceduralManager Medic true>>
    <<endif>>

    <<if $TruthTeller1 == "Cook">>
<<ChangeMention _ProceduralManager Cook true>>
    <<endif>>

    <<if $TruthTeller2 == "Cook">>
<<ChangeMention _ProceduralManager Cook true>>
    <<endif>>

    <<if $TruthTeller1 == "Engineer">>
<<ChangeMention _ProceduralManager Engineer true>>
    <<endif>>

    <<if $TruthTeller2 == "Engineer">>
<<ChangeMention _ProceduralManager Engineer true>>
    <<endif>>

<<set $FirstMateIntAlocked to "true">>
<<if "First Mate" == $TruthTeller1 or "FirstMate" == $TruthTeller1>>
    <<set $FirstMatetestimony2 to $TruthTeller2 + "passed by the room while I was there.">>
    <<AddEntry TestimonyCanvas $FirstMatetestimony2 1stMate_happy>>
<<elseif "First Mate" == $TruthTeller2 or "FirstMate" == $TruthTeller2>>
    <<set $FirstMatetestimony2 to $TruthTeller1 + "passed by the room while I was there.">>
    <<AddEntry TestimonyCanvas $FirstMatetestimony2 1stMate_happy>>
<<endif>>

body:

<<Name|Attlebrox>>
<<NameTagMove|leftEdge>>
<<Portrait|1stMate_Happy>>
Salutation, Captain.
<</Textbox>>

<<if $FirstMateIntAlocked == "false">>
[[Where were you when $VICTIM was killed?|1stMate.IntAanswer]]

[[Bye.|1stMate.IntAend]]
<<endif>>

body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
<<NameTagMove|rightEdge>>
Where were you when $VICTIM was killed?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Attlebrox>>
<<NameTagMove|leftEdge>>

[[I was aboard the bridge.|1stMate.IntAalt]]

<<NameTagMove|leftEdge>>

<<Name|Attlebrox>>
<<NameTagMove|leftEdge>>
<<Portrait|1stMate_neutral>>
Ah, I see.
<</Textbox>>


<<if $FirstMateIntAlocked == "false">>

title: 1stMate.Location
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
<<NameTagMove|rightEdge>>
I've been told you were somewhere else during the murder instead of this room. Is that true?
<</Textbox>>

<<set $randompath to either("true","false")>>


    <<if $randompath == "true">>
[[1stMate.LocationTrue]]
    <<elseif $randompath == "false">>
[[1stMate.LocationFalse]]
<<endif>>

<<name|Captain>>
<<NameTagMove|rightEdge>>

<<NameTagMove|leftEdge>>
